list.abs: 早期的心理学研究学者连稍稍提到无意识的心理历程(nonconscious mental processes)都小心翼翼。到了20世纪上半叶,行为主义因受到心理主义(mentalism)的否定,而在心理.

means.word_mean: 1. concerning mental functioning that is not represented in consciousness;
2. relating to the lack of consciousness of inanimate things
